```html
    <script>
        // Mobile menu toggle
        document.querySelector('.mobile-menu').addEventListener('click', function() {
            document.querySelector('.nav-links').classList.toggle('active');
        });

        // Smooth scrolling for navigation links
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
                if (target) {
                    target.scrollIntoView({
                        behavior: 'smooth',
                        block: 'start'
                    });
                    // Close mobile menu if open
                    document.querySelector('.nav-links').classList.remove('active');
                }
            });
        });

        // Form submission
        document.getElementById('contactForm').addEventListener('submit', function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            alert('Obrigado pelo seu contato! Retornaremos em breve.');
            this.reset();
        });

        // Sticky header
        window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
            const header = document.querySelector('header');
            if (window.scrollY > 100) {
                header.style.background = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95)';
                header.style.backdropFilter = 'blur(10px)';
            } else {
                header.style.background = 'var(--white)';
                header.style.backdropFilter = 'none';
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```

```html
<html lang="pt-BR">

            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        :root {
            --primary: #2563eb;
            --secondary: #0f172a;
            --accent: #f59e0b;
            --light: #f8fafc;
            --text: #1e293b;
            --text-light: #64748b;
            --white: #ffffff;

            --transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        }

        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background: var(--primary);

        }

    <script>
        // Mobile menu toggle
        document.querySelector('.mobile-menu').addEventListener('click', function() {
            document.querySelector('.nav-links').classList.toggle('active');
        });

        // Smooth scrolling for navigation links
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
                if (target) {
                    target.scrollIntoView({
                        behavior: 'smooth',
                        block: 'start'
                    });
                    // Close mobile menu if open
                    document.querySelector('.nav-links').classList.remove('active');
                }
            });
        });

        // Form submission
        document.getElementById('contactForm').addEventListener('submit', function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            alert('Obrigado pelo seu contato! Retornaremos em breve.');
            this.reset();
        });

        // Sticky header
        window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
            const header = document.querySelector('header');
            if (window.scrollY > 100) {
                header.style.background = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95)';
                header.style.backdropFilter = 'blur(10px)';
            } else {
                header.style.background = 'var(--white)';
                header.style.backdropFilter = 'none';
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```

crie um site simples pra mim com o nome sandrielle teste

```html
    <footer>
        <div class="container">
            <p>Sandrielle Teste ¬© 2024. Todos os direitos reservados.</p>
            <div class="social-links">
                <a href="#">LinkedIn</a>
                <a href="#">Instagram</a>
                <a href="#">GitHub</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </footer>

    <script>
        // Mobile menu toggle
        document.querySelector('.mobile-menu').addEventListener('click', function() {
            document.querySelector('.nav-links').classList.toggle('active');
        });

        // Smooth scrolling for navigation links
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
                if (target) {
                    target.scrollIntoView({
                        behavior: 'smooth',
                        block: 'start'
                    });
                    // Close mobile menu if open
                    document.querySelector('.nav-links').classList.remove('active');
                }
            });
        });

        // Close mobile menu when clicking outside
        document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (!e.target.closest('.navbar') && document.querySelector('.nav-links').classList.contains('active')) {
                document.querySelector('.nav-links').classList.remove('active');
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```

- O site que criei para voc√™ √© um arquivo HTML est√°tico, que pode ser aberto localmente no seu computador.

**Op√ß√µes para hospedar seu site e obter um link**

- **GitHub Pages** (gratuito)

  - Fa√ßa um reposit√≥rio e envie o arquivo `index.html`.

- **Vercel** (gratuito)

- **Hospedagem paga**

```html
    <script>
        // Mobile menu toggle
        document.querySelector('.mobile-menu').addEventListener('click', function() {
            document.querySelector('.nav-links').classList.toggle('active');
        });

        // Smooth scrolling for navigation links
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
                if (target) {
                    target.scrollIntoView({
                        behavior: 'smooth',
                        block: 'start'
                    });
                    // Close mobile menu if open
                    document.querySelector('.nav-links').classList.remove('active');
                }
            });
        });

        // Close mobile menu when clicking outside
        document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (!e.target.closest('.navbar') && document.querySelector('.nav-links').classList.contains('active')) {
                document.querySelector('.nav-links').classList.remove('active');
            }
        });
    </script>
```
